title: Update event schedule to show midnight end time for both days

requirements.summary: Update the Schedule/Events page to display that events run until midnight (00:00) on both Day 1 and Day 2
acceptanceCriteria: Day 1 schedule shows events running until midnight (00:00)
Day 2 schedule shows events running until midnight (00:00)
The midnight end time is clearly visible in the timeline display
The schedule maintains its current tournament and game lineup structure

file_operations.description: Modify the schedule timeline display to show events running until midnight (00:00) for both Day 1 and Day 2. Update the final event slot end times to display '00:00' instead of earlier times. Ensure the midnight end time is clearly visible while preserving the existing tournament lineup, game information, day selector dropdown, and cartoon/neon visual styling.
